channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biden’s Press Conference Was A Total Home Run
item.description: If President Biden would have delivered his press conference performance at the debate, none of the Democratic panic would have happened.

item.title: Illegal Aliens Aren’t the Only Ones Migrating. Americans are Too
item.description: IRS data shows that American taxpayers are leaving sanctuary states for states that actually enforce the law. The negative impact of misguided sanctuary policies goes well beyond simply releasing dangerous criminals back onto the streets, it also impacts state economies and tax bases. To read the rest of the article click here The post Illegal Aliens Aren’t the Only Ones Migrating. Americans are Too appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Kamala Harris: Biden Strengthens NATO, While Trump Makes America Weak
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris gave a barn burner of a speech in which she said we can't count on Trump to keep Americans safe, pointing out that President Joe Biden strengthens NATO, while ex-president Donald Trump embraces Putin and makes America weak.

item.title: Massachusetts Governor Maura Healey’s Charade at the Southern Border
item.description: Things are pretty dire in the illegal alien sanctuary Bay State. As FAIR’s 2023 report showed, 393,000 illegal aliens and their U.S.-born children live in Massachusetts, costing taxpayers $2.9 billion annually for health care, education, criminal justice, and general welfare. To read the rest of the article click here The post Massachusetts Governor Maura Healey’s Charade at the Southern Border appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: NATO Leaders Praise Biden As His Leadership Looks Irreplaceable
item.description: NATO leaders are praising President Biden and, in the process, destroying the myth that the President is replaceable with any other Democrat.

item.title: Mayorkas Lies to the American People During Arizona Visit
item.description: Recently impeached Department of Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas visited Tucson, Arizona, and attempted to sell President Biden’s recent executive action as having worked to reduce the number of illegal crossings at the southern border. To read the rest of the article click here The post Mayorkas Lies to the American People During Arizona Visit appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Great News For Democrats As Prices Are Falling For The First Time Since COVID
item.description: Lost in all of the domestic political drama is some really good news for Democrats. For the first time since the pandemic began, prices have fallen.

item.title: Sanctuary Politicians Need to Stop Lying and Admit the Obvious
item.description: Sanctuary politicians are getting nervous, and understandably so. The public is outraged over the surge of high-profile crimes allegedly committed by illegal aliens including the recent murder of 12-year old Jocelyn Nungaray in Houston, the sexual assault of a 13-year-old girl in New York City, and the Maryland rape and murder of Rachel Morin, mother [...] The post Sanctuary Politicians Need to Stop Lying and Admit the Obvious appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Thanks To Democrats The IRS Has Recovered $1 Billion From Rich Tax Cheats
item.description: It is a historic milestone as President Biden and congressional Democrats increased funding for the IRS to go after wealthy people who weren't paying their fair share and the result has been a billion dollars in recovered funds.

item.title: White House Leaves Out Key Fact in Statements on Alleged Murders of Americans by Illegal Aliens
item.description: Over the past two weeks, Americans have seen numerous stories about horrific crimes allegedly committed by illegal aliens. The White House commented on two cases but failed to mention a key fact. To read the rest of the article click here The post White House Leaves Out Key Fact in Statements on Alleged Murders of Americans by Illegal Aliens appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
